author: psmith
msg: Initial version of this plugins preference.  Of course at the moment
you can't change the values yet, and they wouldn't get saved anyway...

author: psmith
msg: child directories are now located 'lazily', that is, only when you explicitly select
the folder in the tree.  This defers the cost of finding out the children until
you need it, making the gui much snappier.
Changed so that important user messages go to the MessageCenter for
Currently I am not sure how to determine when child directories become 'stale'
and I have taken the approach that they 'never' do, and I will add

author: psmith
msg: removed (moved) a method into a more appropriate class, it is not
really a utility method, as it is really specific to a particular function.

author: psmith
msg: Changed so that only DEBUG messages are shown in the MessageCenter
when the log4j.debug property has been set to true.

author: ceki
msg: Added necessary fields to support LocationInfo.
